name: Four Fierce Heroes
description:
Four Fierce Heroes

A fantasy story following four heroes in a classic RPG style game. 

Will you make it? Or break it? 

Also includes mini-games for a change. 

Expected time to finish game : maximum 3 hours.

Download the game --->Unzip it--->Open" FourFierceHeroes.exe" --->Have fun!

It's my first indie project so all comments will be welcomed in order to improve myself.

Game guide below: 

[spoiler]

Game guide for now: 

DONT READ IF YOU WANT TO EXPLORE THE GAME BY YOURSELF. It will spoil the fun!!

1. Directional control using keyboard up, down, left, right. Press Z/ENTER/Space to select and interact with objects and npc. Press X to cancel.
2. Town—>interact with all npc, letters, chests, stars. Purchase as much health recovery items  as possible. 
3. Head south to cave. Fight only single slime/bat using magic(not attack). Escape  from group monsters battles/Minotaur/orc. Level up till at least lvl 5. Use green port key to fully restore HP/MP and save.
4. Reach lvl 5—>Inside cave—> go top right corner and read the tombstone. Head to the rope.
5. Forest of maze—> Explore and interact with crystals for in game weather effects. Choose correct teleport portal.
6. Heaven trials—> talk to npc. 
7. Find the correct teleport portal.
8. Trial level 2–> escape from all battles. Interact with books of wisdom. Remember them well! Interact with NPC for mini-game.
9. Trial level 3–>only engage in battles with single Lord Yuna for quick leveling. Do not engage in battles with more spirits as they can damage your HP massively at low levels. Rmb books of wisdoms? Apply it well. Once you reach level 40-50, head to the yellow teleport portal on top right corner. You may also choose to train in the cave if u get bored of the heaven’s trials map. 
10. Head back to town by exiting cave and refill on items needed. Ignore equipment.

11. Enter cave and solve maze puzzle. You should be able to defeat monsters encounters easily/choose to escape. Save before Interacting with mini-boss monster. Head up the cave door.
12. You may train here till level 50 by reentering the cave again as the mini-boss monsters drop rare equipments and gold.
13. At level 45, most of your heroes will learn ultimate skills. Fight final boss.
